title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: They talking about losing money.But they cant understood there is bounty hunting services when someone will own the money it's problem.I never seen that big money losses will end up like victims dont do nothing. If police not helping they will use bounty hunters and times Are tough many mobsters will take that Job.Look If you tell some exchanger own you the money the old mercenaries and all kind of mobs Will take that Job.The bigger then money the more people will want to take bounty Job.For example construction business If you own the money the bounty hunters Will come and you have to pay higher % so guys stealing is not easy be honest.Those who talk about exchangers not ur keys not ur coins u Are Kids... People nowdays can give Job to bounty hunters who Will find any people in the world and always Will bring the money We just dont hear from the news but i tell you everyday someone who owns the money getting busted by bounty hunters

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Heyactually i can't clearly understand what you are trying to say but from your topic it seems to be bounty hunting, first crypto bounty hunting is not that favorable at this time and many projects hardly succeed or even pays their hunters at the ends of the determined weeks and months per says. Then talking about exchange, it comes from listing maybe after the project succeeded they could apply for listing and if their projects meets the exchange requirements then they will list and make announcement about upcoming listing of the new coin/token.Please when next creating a topic, there should be a reason for creating such not just spamming otherwise i would want the mod to lock this thread to avoid more spamming.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.created_time: November 11, 2022, 08:39:09 PMLast edit: November 11, 2022, 08:50:41 PM by CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on November 11, 2022, 03:46:54 PMThose who talk about exchangers not ur keys not ur coins u Are Kids... People nowdays can give Job to bounty hunters who Will find any people in the world and always Will bring the money I had to stretch my eyes and read over and over again before I could at least grab this particular statement about you referring to people who always make emphasis "Not your key not your coin" as kids. But I will like to ask, do you know what this statement actually means? Because if you do you won't say what you just said, as there are several reasons why people make that statement and it Is,* When your coin is on an exchange you do not have total control over it, because one day the exchange could wake up and freeze your funds or go bankrupt and you lose all your assets.While,* When your coin is stored in a cold wallet such as "Electrum", you are presented with a private key whereby you have total control over the entire asset, as it can't be frozen or lost, in as much as you can still remember the keys

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on November 11, 2022, 03:46:54 PMThose who talk about exchangers not ur keys not ur coins u Are Kids...We're not kids, we're all adults that have been on that shoes that we don't understand the phrase. But thanks to the first people that have reminded us about that and made us understand what that really meant.Quote from: Fullbear2222 on November 11, 2022, 03:46:54 PMPeople nowdays can give Job to bounty hunters who Will find any people in the world and always Will bring the money Bounty hunting isn't a secured thing. That's why there are too many bounty hunters that have lost their enthusiasm on it because it's not worth it at all most specially on a bear market.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Your post is filled with misunderstanding. You don't want people to understand what message you want to pass out. Anyway, bounty hunters are always been used. It didn't start recently, it has been longer time that bounty hunters have been cheated upon and right now people are not supporting projects like in 2016/17, you hardly see a reputable member joining to promote the shit coins. So what is your point?

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: palle11 on November 11, 2022, 09:02:54 PMYour post is filled with misunderstanding. You don't want people to understand what message you want to pass out. Anyway, bounty hunters are always been used. It didn't start recently, it has been longer time that bounty hunters have been cheated upon and right now people are not supporting projects like in 2016/17, you hardly see a reputable member joining to promote the shit coins. So what is your point?i believe, the OP is talking about a different bounty hunting job. read again and try to understand what he's saying, even if it is hard to understand his statements.   it is like paying someone to do the job (i don't know if you know what i mean here). it is like paid mercenaries. definitely, some are hiring this kind of bounty hunters, however, maybe if the money involved is big. but if it is only small, is it really worth it hiring a bounty hunter? most of the time, you just let it go.

comments.author: sulendra12
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on November 11, 2022, 03:46:54 PMI never seen that big money losses will end up like victims dont do nothing. If police not helping they will use bounty hunters and times Are tough many mobsters will take that Job.Look If you tell some exchanger own you the money the old mercenaries and all kind of mobs Will take that Job.Most of the bounty hunters are thinking their efforts are wasted by dealing with scammers although most of the social media campaigns they joined are full of botted tweets and posts. They should have known better, if they don't research first then they should take the consequences instead of just blaming in crypto groups. I'm actually tired looking those people blindly choosing the projects.Quote from: Fullbear2222 on November 11, 2022, 03:46:54 PMThe bigger then money the more people will want to take bounty Job.Even then, if it pays like a dust they will still apply to the bounty lol.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on November 11, 2022, 09:43:40 PMQuote from: palle11 on November 11, 2022, 09:02:54 PMYour post is filled with misunderstanding. You don't want people to understand what message you want to pass out. Anyway, bounty hunters are always been used. It didn't start recently, it has been longer time that bounty hunters have been cheated upon and right now people are not supporting projects like in 2016/17, you hardly see a reputable member joining to promote the shit coins. So what is your point?i believe, the OP is talking about a different bounty hunting job. read again and try to understand what he's saying, even if it is hard to understand his statements.   it is like paying someone to do the job (i don't know if you know what i mean here). it is like paid mercenaries. definitely, some are hiring this kind of bounty hunters, however, maybe if the money involved is big. but if it is only small, is it really worth it hiring a bounty hunter? most of the time, you just let it go.^It is a mixed idea based on my understanding.Crypto bounty hunters help scam projects as OP meant and even though they know, they blindly accept it because hoping of making a profit when they received the reward. But not all of them are worth it to promote. It is risky to be a bounty hunter and the reason why I stopped this is because you don't know if you are helping a project that scams people. All you think is profit that will probably get not be the quality and potential of the project.

comments.author: stomachgrowls
comments.body: Wait.. What?Do you really know on what bounty hunter is? How these hunters been used on getting some money from others?What you do say about being busted by bounty hunters?Totally mind confusing the way you do really define on what bounty hunter is.This is why lots of people who had read up the words you've been saying been confused on what you are trying to say.Bounty hunters are just simply joining up for the sake of money earning.They arent involved nor included on whatever we do call about.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: I don't think I understand most of what you've got there in OP at OP and so, you need to pay a little attention to how you put your write up. Meanwhile, I seem to have picked up on this part of your write up and still I would ask if your for real on this;Quote from: Fullbear2222 on November 11, 2022, 03:46:54 PMThose who talk about exchangers not ur keys not ur coins u Are Kids... People nowdays can give Job to bounty hunters who Will find any people in the world and always Will bring the money We just dont hear from the news but i tell you everyday someone who owns the money getting busted by bounty hunters You mean people could take and execute this search and return jobs provided the money for payment is available?I wonder how private keys, seed phrases, lost hard drives or disc and others containing bitcoins arr been lost and continues to be lost up to this day and still aren't been found!Perhaps you might let those bounty hunters know they are on high demand.

comments.author: TelolettOm
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on November 11, 2022, 03:46:54 PMThe bigger then money the more people will want to take bounty Job.If you mean bounty allocation, surely a bigger allocation will attract more people to join. However, most people know that the big allocation of money can end with nothing if it is not escrowed. So, the escrowed bounty payment seems more interesting than a bigger bounty payment allocation. Especially if the payment is in the top coins, not in the new coins.

comments.author: Fatunad
comments.body: Quote from: TelolettOm on November 11, 2022, 11:17:08 PMQuote from: Fullbear2222 on November 11, 2022, 03:46:54 PMThe bigger then money the more people will want to take bounty Job.If you mean bounty allocation, surely a bigger allocation will attract more people to join. However, most people know that the big allocation of money can end with nothing if it is not escrowed. So, the escrowed bounty payment seems more interesting than a bigger bounty payment allocation. Especially if the payment is in the top coins, not in the new coins.Big allocation or budget or partition would be totally useless since most of the projects would really be paying up with their own tokens which means that their value isnt known yet.No matter how generous or big the staking would be giving out or allocation but if these tokens would be ending up on having no value then all of your efforts and hard work wouldsuch come to waste and this is why bounty hunting is never been that good or ideal to do nowadays because of this reason.It would be only worth if you do join up on a campaign or bounties which do pay up on established coins like Btc and other altcoins which you could potentially make out conversion but if not thenrisk is always there.
